title: saamI idhE
sahitya:
sAmI idE nalla samayam tandaruL abhayam



anupallavi



kAm  nAn AnAlum kA enai kaliyuga varadA kanda



caraNam



bAla vElavA nI vA vandenai kAlan aNugAmalumE kAenai k  ekk lum kA enai

kOla navanItacOra gOpAlan mAn maruga kavi kunjaradAsanukku aruL kUDi nIDiDavE

aruL guruguha
